aiAssistant.title: AI Letter Generator
aiAssistant.subtitle: Generate visa support letters
aiAssistant.placeholderLetter:
Dear Sir/Madam,

This letter has been prepared as a support letter for {name}'s visit to {country}.

The applicant is employed at {workplace} as a {position}. A {reason} trip is planned between {departureDate} and {returnDate}.

Passport No: {passportNo}

Sincerely.

supportCenter.title: Support Center
supportCenter.subtitle: Frequently asked questions and help
supportCenter.faq1Content: Click the 'New Application' button in the Applications menu to fill out the application form. After filling in the required fields, click 'Save' to create your application.
supportCenter.faq2Content: Click the 'New Appointment' button in the Appointments menu. Enter client details, appointment date, and other details to create an appointment.
supportCenter.faq3Content: From the Finance Center page, you can create and manage invoices for applications. You can track invoice statuses and update payment information.
supportCenter.faq4Content: Configure your OpenAI API key from the AI Settings page. Then you can ask questions with AI Data Analysis and generate letters with AI Assistant.
supportCenter.faq5Content: From your Profile page, in the security settings section, enter your current password and set your new password.
supportCenter.faq6Content: From the 2FA Security page, enable one of the email, SMS, or TOTP (Google Authenticator) methods to enhance your account security.

profile.title: Profile
profile.mobileAppDescription: Scan the QR code with your mobile app to sign in.
profile.dangerDescription: These actions are irreversible. Please be careful.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and all your data will be permanently deleted.

contracts.title: Contract Signing
contracts.subtitle: Digital contract management
contracts.sectionPartiesContent: This agreement is made between the Unusual Consulting platform (hereinafter referred to as 'Platform') and the platform user (hereinafter referred to as 'User').
contracts.sectionTermsContent: The User agrees to use the platform only for lawful purposes. All data on the platform is stored securely and is not shared with third parties.
contracts.sectionAuthorityContent: The Platform provides tools for managing visa application processes. The Platform does not guarantee application results. The User is responsible for the accuracy of the information entered.
contracts.sectionLegalContent: This agreement is subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. In case of disputes, Istanbul courts are authorized.
